introduction: SYNOPSISMarisa lives alone after her family immigrated to a foreign country. She tries to kill herself throwing herself to a running motorcycle but her attempt finished incomplete due to In-pyo's rescue. After that she puts herself into a dissolute life day after day. Both of them hold the old grief in their hearts; she lost her lover at a car accident and he lost his dear wife and daughter in the sea. In the end, they realize their mutual affection and ..故事离开家庭独自生活的22岁的老太太玛莉莎自觉eoteuna在一辆摩托车上跳所有移民被inpyo她是在夜间丢失的浪子生活幻觉救出。玛丽莎一定会喜欢这个yoseop谁度过了死亡的日子里，自己在交通事故中，冲击损失，来了inpyo在海洋的同时失去了他的妻子和女儿后疼痛的困扰。玛丽莎和inpyo相结合，使爱和承诺，彼此的新生活。
